card.card1_title: High-precision Plant Stand Count for Corn, Sunflower and Sugar Beet by a Drone and AI
card.card1_text: Plant stand count is an essential task in yield management. It allows growers to estimate the plant population, density, germination rate, and plant health and make timely decisions that finally affect the yield.
card.card2_title: New DJI Agriculture Drone Insight Report Reveals Greater Acceptance, Advanced Farming Techniques and Exploration of Best Practices for Farmers
card.card3_title: What does agricultural drone spraying of 66.7 million hectares mean to the planet?
